TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit KoreanCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示朝鲜历。

span.span: Represents the Korean calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 朝鲜历具有公历，与完全相同，只不过的年和纪元不相同。The Korean calendar is exactly like the Gregorian calendar, except that the year and era are different. > [!NOTE] > 有关使用信息类和其他日历.NET Framework 中的类，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 类只识别当前纪元。The class recognizes only the current era. 朝鲜历闰年公历日历中的相同闰年与相对应。Leap years in the Korean calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 用公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果是整除 100 除外的整除公历年。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 但是，由 400 是整除的公历年是闰年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 常见的一 365 年天，闰年 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 朝鲜历有 12 个月 28 至 31 天内使用：The Korean calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: |GetMonth 值GetMonth value|月份Month|在平年中的天Days in common years|中的日闰年Days in leap years| |--------------------|-----------|--------------------------|------------------------| |11|1 月）1월 (January)|3131|3131| |22|2 月）2월 (February)|2828|2929| |33|3 月）3월 (March)|3131|3131| |44|4 月）4월 (April)|3030|3030| |55|5월 （5 月）5월 (May)|3131|3131| |66|6월 （年 6 月）6월 (June)|3030|3030| |77|7월 （年 7 月）7월 (July)|3131|3131| |88|8 （年 8 月）8월 (August)|3131|3131| |99|9 月9월 (September)|3030|3030| |1010|10 月10월 (October)|3131|3131| |1111|11 月11월 (November)|3030|3030| |1212|12 月12월 (December)|3131|3131| 二月有 29 天在闰年和在平年的第 28 天。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 days during common years. 日期公元 2001 年 1 月 1 日The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 在公历中等同的朝鲜语的日历中的当前纪元 4334 年 1 月的第一天。in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the first day of January in the year 4334 of the current era in the Korean calendar. 每个对象支持一组的日历。Each object supports a set of calendars. 属性返回区域性的默认日历和属性返回一个数组，包含所有支持的区域性的日历。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要更改使用的日历，该应用程序应设置的属性到新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

span.span: Working with Calendars

related.span: 示例:日历周范围实用工具

span.span: Sample: Calendar Week Range Utility

public: override DateTime AddMonths(DateTime time, int months);
override this.AddMonths : DateTime * int -> DateTime

param.name: time
param.span: ，将向其添加月数。

span.span: The to which to add months.

param.name: months
param.span: 要添加的月数。

span.span: The number of months to add.

summary.span: 返回与指定 相距指定月数的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: 将指定月数添加到指定的 中时得到的 。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的年份部分受影响，如果结果的月份之外的指定年份。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的指定纪元，且引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是 10 月，包含 31 天，指定的日期是该月 31 日和的值`months`参数为 6，生成的年是一个多个指定的年份，生成的月份是年 4 月，并生成 day 为 30 天，即在年 4 月的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果的值`months`参数为负，从而早于指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值了朝鲜日历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Korean calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/koreancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/CS/koreancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/VB/koreancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

span.span: is less than -120000.
-or-
is greater than 120000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的月份部分保持不变，与指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的指定纪元，且引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，年 2 月有 28 天，但在它时有 29 天闰年。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是闰年年 2 月 29 日和的值`years`为 1，则得到的日期是在下一 2 年月 28 日。If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date is the 28th day of February in the following year. 如果`years`为负，从而早于指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. span.span: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的一天被指从一年的第一天的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，对的第一个月的第一天返回 1，和过去一天的上个月返回总天数该年份的。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year. 总计是相同的值返回的。The total is the same value as that returned by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值了朝鲜日历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Korean calendar. summary.span: 计算指定纪元年份的闰月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

returns.span: 返回值始终为 0，因为 类不支持闰月这一概念。

span.span: The return value is always 0 because the class does not support the notion of a leap month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在日历中支持闰月的概念，特定月后或在一年中的任何月份之后发生的闰月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法返回一个数字，介于 1 到 13，该值指示指定日期与关联的月份之间。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果，在一年的第八个和第九个月之间存在闰月方法的第八个月内，闰第 8 个月的 9 和 10 中的第九个月返回 8。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于通过设置来确定年份的周数`time`到一年中的最后一天的参数。This method can be used to determine the number of weeks in the year by setting the `time` parameter to the last day of the year. 包含可用于特定于区域性的值`rule`和`firstDayOfWeek`参数。 contains culture-specific values that can be used for the `rule` and `firstDayOfWeek` parameters. 的属性包含默认值，该值表示特定区域性，使用中指定的日历周的第一天属性。The property of contains the default value that represents the first day of the week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the property of . 的属性包含默认值，该值定义特定区域性，使用日历中指定一个日历周属性。The property of contains the default value that defines a calendar week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the property of . 例如，在， 1 月 1 日，则返回 1。For example, in , for January 1 returns 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何的结果各不相同，具体取决于和使用的值。The following code example shows how the result of varies depending on the and values used. 如果指定的日期，在一年的最后一天返回该年份的周的总数。If the specified date is the last day of the year, returns the total number of weeks in that year. summary.span: 确定指定纪元中的指定日期是否为闰日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期是闰日，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 朝鲜历闰年公历日历中的相同闰年与相对应。Leap years in the Korean calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 用公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果是整除 100 除外的整除公历年。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 但是，由 400 是整除的公历年是闰年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 常见的一 365 年天，闰年 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰日是仅在闰年中发生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 例如，年 2 月 29 日是唯一的闰日。For example, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下面的示例调用中每个纪元的五年的第二个月 （年 2 月） 的最后一天。The following example calls for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/koreancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/koreancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/koreancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 朝鲜历闰年公历日历中的相同闰年与相对应。Leap years in the Korean calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 用公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果是整除 100 除外的整除公历年。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 但是，由 400 是整除的公历年是闰年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 常见的一 365 年天，闰年 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰月是整月，仅在闰年中发生。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 朝鲜日历不具有任何闰月。The Korean calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下面的示例调用中的当前纪元中的五年的每月。The following example calls for all the months in five years in the current era. returns.span: 包含 的四位数表示形式的整数。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义可由表示的 100 年范围内的上一年。 defines the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by . 通过查找该 100 年范围内两位数年份的唯一匹配项确定纪元。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the two-digit year within that 100-year range. 例如，如果设置为 2029，则 100 年范围是从 1930 年至 2029年。For example, if is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，两位数字值为 30 被解释为 1930 年，而 29 两位数字值解释为 2029年。Therefore, a two-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a two-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 传递一个两位数的年份值 (小于 100) 导致该方法将值转换为四位数字值根据值，该值表示相应的纪元。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供对在支持的日历范围内的四位数年份值，该方法返回的实际输入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供支持的日历范围之外的四位数字值或提供一个负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出了日历支持的范围。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许两位数年份，以正确转换为四位数年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，在公历日历中，如果此属性设置为 2029，100 年范围是从 1930 年到 2029年。For example, in the Gregorian calendar, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930 年，而 29 一个 2 位值被解释为 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 此属性的初始值被派生自控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的设置。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 但是，该信息可以更改的生命周期内。However, that information can change during the life of the . 类不检测系统设置中的更改自动。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 应用程序应将此值设置为 99，以指示是按字面 2 位数字的年份。The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 例如，如果此属性设置为 99，100 年范围是从 0 （不是有效值对于大多数日历） 到 99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值小于 99。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
-or-

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值大于 。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is greater than .

exception.span: 在设置操作中，当前实例是只读的。

span.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
